item.title: Summary - Tropical Storm ANDREA (AT1/AL012013)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...HEAVY RAIN OCCURRING ALONG THE WEST COAST OF FLORIDA AS ANDREA MOVES NORTHWARD... As of 10:00 PM CDT Wed Jun 5 the center of ANDREA was located near 26.0, -86.3 with movement N at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: ANDREA
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...HEAVY RAIN OCCURRING ALONG THE WEST COAST OF FLORIDA AS ANDREA MOVES NORTHWARD...
